INSERT INTO call_back_archives
(txnid, firstname, email, phone, api_key, api_mode, status, unmappedstatus, cardcategory, addedon, payment_source, pg_type, bank_ref_num, bankcode, error, name_on_card, cardnum, issuing_bank, card_type, easepayid, amount, net_amount_debit, cash_back_percentage, deduction_percentage, productinfo, udf10, udf9, udf8, udf7, udf6, udf5, udf4, udf3, udf2, udf1, hash, surl, furl, error_message, merchant_logo, upi_va, created_on, ip_address, host_address) VALUES (:P1 /* {{$_POST.txnid}} */, :P2 /* {{$_POST.firstname}} */, :P3 /* {{$_POST.email}} */, :P4 /* {{$_POST.phone}} */, :P5 /* {{$_POST.key}} */, :P6 /* {{$_POST.mode}} */, :P7 /* {{$_POST.status}} */, :P8 /* {{$_POST.unmappedstatus}} */, :P9 /* {{$_POST.cardcategory}} */, :P10 /* {{$_POST.addedon}} */, :P11 /* {{$_POST.payment_source}} */, :P12 /* {{$_POST.pg_type}} */, :P13 /* {{$_POST.bank_ref_num}} */, :P14 /* {{$_POST.bankcode}} */, :P15 /* {{$_POST.error}} */, :P16 /* {{$_POST.name_on_card}} */, :P17 /* {{$_POST.cardnum}} */, :P18 /* {{$_POST.issuing_bank}} */, :P19 /* {{$_POST.card_type}} */, :P20 /* {{$_POST.easepayid}} */, :P21 /* {{$_POST.amount}} */, :P22 /* {{$_POST.net_amount_debit}} */, :P23 /* {{$_POST.cash_back_percentage}} */, :P24 /* {{$_POST.deduction_percentage}} */, :P25 /* {{$_POST.productinfo}} */, :P26 /* {{$_POST.udf10}} */, :P27 /* {{$_POST.udf9}} */, :P28 /* {{$_POST.udf8}} */, :P29 /* {{$_POST.udf7}} */, :P30 /* {{$_POST.udf6}} */, :P31 /* {{$_POST.udf5}} */, :P32 /* {{$_POST.udf4}} */, :P33 /* {{$_POST.udf3}} */, :P34 /* {{$_POST.udf2}} */, :P35 /* {{$_POST.udf1}} */, :P36 /* {{$_POST.hash}} */, :P37 /* {{$_POST.surl}} */, :P38 /* {{$_POST.furl}} */, :P39 /* {{$_POST.error_message}} */, :P40 /* {{$_POST.merchant_logo}} */, :P41 /* {{$_POST.upi_va}} */, :P42 /* {{NOW}} */, :P43 /* {{$_SERVER.REMOTE_ADDR}} */, :P44 /* {{$_SERVER.HOST_ADDR}} */)

UPDATE easybuzz_pay_link
SET payment_status = :P1 /* {{'SUCCESS'}} */
WHERE req_txn_id = :P2 /* {{GetPayReqDetails.req_txn_id}} */

INSERT INTO r_order
(order_id, user_id, total_amt, discount, ex_charge_amt, ex_comm_amt, delevery_amt, user_name, address, mobile, whatsapp, pin, ps, dist, state, country, wallet_bal, created_by, created_on, status, payment_status, order_assigned_to, applied_promo_id, wallet_cashback_amt, wallet_deduct_amt, wallet_closing_amt) VALUES (:P1 /* {{GetPreOrder.order_id}} */, :P2 /* {{GetPreOrder.user_id}} */, :P3 /* {{GetPreOrder.total_amt}} */, :P4 /* {{GetPreOrder.discount}} */, :P5 /* {{GetPreOrder.ex_charge_amt}} */, :P6 /* {{GetPreOrder.ex_comm_amt}} */, :P7 /* {{GetPreOrder.delevery_amt}} */, :P8 /* {{GetPreOrder.user_name}} */, :P9 /* {{GetPreOrder.address}} */, :P10 /* {{GetPreOrder.mobile}} */, :P11 /* {{GetPreOrder.whatsapp}} */, :P12 /* {{GetPreOrder.pin}} */, :P13 /* {{GetPreOrder.ps}} */, :P14 /* {{GetPreOrder.dist}} */, :P15 /* {{GetPreOrder.state}} */, :P16 /* {{GetPreOrder.country}} */, :P17 /* {{GetPreOrder.wallet_bal}} */, :P18 /* {{GetPreOrder.created_by}} */, :P19 /* {{NOW}} */, :P20 /* {{GetPreOrder.status}} */, :P21 /* {{GetPreOrder.payment_status}} */, :P22 /* {{GetPreOrder.order_assigned_to}} */, :P23 /* {{GetPreOrder.applied_promo_id}} */, :P24 /* {{GetPreOrder.wallet_cashback_amt}} */, :P25 /* {{GetPreOrder.wallet_deduct_amt}} */, :P26 /* {{GetPreOrder.wallet_closing_amt}} */)

INSERT INTO r_order_details
(order_table_id, prod_id, price_id, cart_id, user_id, prod_qty, each_unit_price, charge_per, charge_value, charge_amt, comm_per, comm_value, comm_amt, each_net_amt, order_status, remarks, created_by, created_on, updated_on, payment_status, purchase_price) VALUES (:P1 /* {{AddOrder.identity}} */, :P2 /* {{GetPreOrderDetails[$index].prod_id}} */, :P3 /* {{GetPreOrderDetails[$index].price_id}} */, :P4 /* {{cGetPreOrderDetails[$index].art_id}} */, :P5 /* {{GetPreOrderDetails[$index].user_id}} */, :P6 /* {{GetPreOrderDetails[$index].prod_qty}} */, :P7 /* {{GetPreOrderDetails[$index].each_unit_price}} */, :P8 /* {{GetPreOrderDetails[$index].charge_per}} */, :P9 /* {{GetPreOrderDetails[$index].charge_value}} */, :P10 /* {{GetPreOrderDetails[$index].charge_amt}} */, :P11 /* {{GetPreOrderDetails[$index].comm_per}} */, :P12 /* {{GetPreOrderDetails[$index].comm_value}} */, :P13 /* {{GetPreOrderDetails[$index].comm_amt}} */, :P14 /* {{GetPreOrderDetails[$index].each_net_amt}} */, :P15 /* {{GetPreOrderDetails[$index].order_status}} */, :P16 /* {{GetPreOrderDetails[$index].remarks}} */, :P17 /* {{GetPreOrderDetails[$index].created_by}} */, :P18 /* {{GetPreOrderDetails[$index].created_on}} */, :P19 /* {{NOW}} */, :P20 /* {{GetPreOrderDetails[$index].payment_status}} */, :P21 /* {{GetPreOrderDetails[$index].purchase_price}} */)
